Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows members of the New York city employees' retirement system and the New York city board of education employees' retirement system to elect the benefits provided in chapter 96 of the laws of 1995
Summary: Allows members of the New York city employees' retirement system and the New York city board of education employees' retirement system to elect the benefits provided in chapter 96 of the laws of 1995.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing members of the New York city employees' retirement system and the New York city board of education employees' retirement system to elect the benefits provided by chapter 96 of the laws of 1995
